name: Cabbage Defender
description:
Cabbage Defender is a game made in under 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 with the theme KEEP IT ALIVE. It is a top-down shooter about a caterpillar who hopelessly defends his cabbage from an endless horde of rabbits, as there forces grow progressively stronger. All this, with a water pistol. 

Spray enemies to scare them off. Spray your cabbage to keep it healthy.

Reach wave 20 to win.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Mouse to aim
